
npm install --save 

npm install --save-dev cssnano del eslint eslint-config-airbnb-base eslint-config-prettier eslint-plugin-import eslint-plugin-prettier gulp gulp-append-prepend-no-trim gulp-debug gulp-file gulp-flatten gulp-htmlmin gulp-if gulp-modifier gulp-postcss gulp-rename gulp-replace gulp-sass lazypipe postcss prettier sass userscript-meta-f4w
